zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，等待突破]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在12.1151美元附近震荡整理，24小时变化为0.72%。在高点12.2584美元和低点12.0063美元之间波动，显示出市场情绪相对稳定，短期内缺乏明显的方向性。投资者需要密切关注价格是否能突破当前区间，以判断后续的趋势。

从技术指标来看，MACD显示出微弱的看涨信号，当前值为0.0779，暗示买方力量略有增强。然而，RSI指标目前缺失，无法提供超买或超卖的具体信息，建议投资者在进入市场前，等待更多的技术确认信号。SMA(20)在11.69926美元，提供了一定的支撑，若价格回调至此水平，可视为买入机会。

对于支撑和阻力位的分析，短期内的支撑位在11.70美元附近，而阻力位则在12.25美元。若价格突破12.25美元，可以考虑逢高卖出，反之若跌破11.70美元，则可能会进一步回调。在当前市场环境中，建议投资者保持观望，耐心等待突破信号出现后再做决策。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.1151, reflecting a modest 0.72% increase over the past 24 hours. The price action has recently shown a consolidation pattern within the range defined by the high of $12.2584 and the low of $12.0063. This tight range suggests indecision among traders, but a break above the resistance at $12.25 could signal a bullish continuation, while a drop below $12.00 may indicate a reversal towards lower support levels.

The absence of an RSI value complicates momentum analysis, yet the MACD reading of 0.0779 suggests a slight bullish momentum. Traders should keep a close watch on the MACD signal line for any potential crossovers that could confirm a change in trend. The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $11.6993 offers a solid foundation of support, indicating that as long as AVAX remains above this level, the short-term outlook remains positive.

Support levels can be identified at $12.00 and further down at $11.50, while resistance is positioned around the recent high of $12.25. A successful breach of this resistance could open the way towards $12.50 and beyond. Conversely, failure to maintain above $12.00 could trigger a sell-off, pushing the price towards the SMA and potentially lower.

For traders considering entry points, a buy signal could be established upon a confirmed break above $12.25, ideally accompanied by increased volume. On the flip side, if the price falls below $12.00, it may be wise to reassess positions and consider shorting or waiting for a clearer signal of recovery. Monitoring market sentiment and volume will be crucial for navigating potential volatility in the near term.
